title: Ecommerce video editor for ads
job_overview:
I’m looking for a talented and reliable video editor to create high-converting video ads for my e-commerce brand. Your main focus will be editing short-form videos for platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok.

Responsibilities:

Edit raw footage into engaging ad creatives (5–30 seconds)

Understand marketing hooks, CTAs, and split-testing concepts

Add captions, transitions, and on-brand animations

add voice-over but also bring your own creative input

Deliver edits quickly with revisions as needed

Requirements:

Proven experience editing e-commerce or social media ads

Strong portfolio with similar work

Good understanding of direct-response marketing principles

Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

Fluent in English communication

Test Edit:
Shortlisted candidates will be asked to complete a paid test edit using provided footage and scripts.

If you’re creative, reliable, and eager to grow with my brand, I’d love to hear from you!
